text:
Arey bhai!
Tere se bakchod banda koi nhi hai poore campus main. Jab hum kaam shuru krte the, tu khatam krra hota tha. Academically to bhut madad kari hi hai, but you are also go-to guy for any type of gyaan. Bahut chill vibes aati hain tere saath. Aur teri blunt honesty bhi pasand hai mujhe. Woh CAA-NRC par debate, aur woh singing sessions hamesha yaad rahenge. I am sure you will do great in life. Hamesha touch main rehna aur milte rehna. Lucky to have met you â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Aman bhai!
Kafi bhola sa aur Shaant banda rha hai tu. Aate hi squash aur badminton main chaap diya ğŸ˜‰ Tere aur P******* ki jodi bana di aesi hi sabne ğŸ˜›.
Pehle 2 saal kafi maze kre humne. 2nd year main toh tera aur Ashu ke room main aake kya hi mast bulla kaat-te the. Class, lab se aake seedha tumhare room jate the ğŸ˜›. Third year se serious ho gya thoda. But cricket wagera khelne toh aa hi jata tha. Apne targets ke liye hardworking rha hai, aise hi aage bhi mehnat krte rehna. Milte rehna bhai, aur future ke liye all the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Anant Sinha bhai!
Pta nahi kab tera poora naam lene ki aadat pad gyi, but ab maza aata hai ğŸ˜›. Bahut achha time spend kra hai humne. You have been one of the most calm and patient guys I've met. Tere handwash ke toh kya hi kehne ğŸ˜›. Itne saare clubs ka secy banke kya hi surprise kra tha tune ğŸ˜…. 2nd year main mast Mumbai ghumaya tha tune, aur 90 lakh ka toilet ab bhi yaad hai ğŸ˜‚. Pubg se lekar Valorant tk, sab games main kafi enjoy kra hai apan ne. Nightcreeper wala account to ab mera hi ho gya hai lol. Halaki Goa trip sabke liye memorable experience tha, but tere liye toh sabse zyada tha. Woh Whatsapp chats toh shayad ab kabhi na delete ho ğŸ˜›. Not an expert in this field, but good luck here too ğŸ˜‰.
Tera amazon prime to kafi use kra hai maine. 1-day delivery ki aadat dalwa di hai tune ğŸ˜…. Waise sorry agar maine kabhi rudely bol diya ho, never meant to do so. Hamesha touch main rehna and all the best for the future! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Archies bhai!
Games ka ye safar jaari rahe. Fortnite ka Valorant ho gya but dabbe ki "boiling" ab bhi jaari hai ğŸ˜‚. Kabhi acads ke bahane, kabhi games ke, aise hi milte rahe hum. Sudhanshu se zyada tumhe jagaya hoga maine 2nd year main ğŸ˜…. Aur woh TA202 ka project yaad hai? Kya hi dimaag kharaab hua tha usme ğŸ˜­. Waise tumhare Guitar ne mujhe realize krwaya ki meri ungliyaan kitni choti hain. Saari strings cover hi nhi ho pa rhi thi ğŸ˜‚.
Aise hi touch main rehna aage bhi. Aur future ke liye all the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Aryan bhai!
Winter camp se lekar final sem ke baad tak, apna kaam chalta rha. One of the most dedicated  (jis cheez main interest ho xD) guys I've met. Team ka PR department tune hi sambhaala hai hamesha. Ever active on internet, be it FB, CC discuss and now Twitter ğŸ˜›. Trips main maza bhut aya. Inter-iit main toh kya hi krke aaye the hum ğŸ˜‚. Thoda careless at times jab interest na ho ğŸ˜…. Smart, hardworking and quick-learner. Aise hi aage chaapte rehna. Milte rahenge and All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Hi Monika,
Haan SPS ke end main kya hi rush kra tha humne, but sab sahi ho gya finally ğŸ˜…. Waise seeing your Yoga pics in my feed makes me feel guilty ğŸ˜‚. Hope ki kisi din I'll start it doing regularly tooğŸ˜…. Nice knowing you and all the best for future! ğŸ˜€
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey bhai!
Assignments aur hackathons ke liye jo nightouts mare hain hamesha yaad rahenge ğŸ˜‰. Aur woh TA ke projects main jo dimaag kharaab hua tha, woh bhi yaad hai ğŸ˜«. Bhut sare courses saath main nikale hain apan ne, aur maze bhi bhut kare. I like how sincere you are. Almost saare assignments ka initial code tune hi likha hoga ğŸ˜…. Aur PUBG ke maze toh hain hi. Agli trip jab plan plan kare batana, Manali nhi ja paya main ğŸ˜•.
Chal touch main rehna hamesha, lucky to have met you â¤ï¸ï¸.
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Ashu bhai,
Wing ka sabse achhe bulle tere yha hi kaate hain. Aur shayad GPL bhi sabse zyada teri hi hui hain. Sabse prepared aur organized kamra rakhta tha. I can't even count kitni baar tere se baalti, shampoo, scissors etc. liya hai maine ğŸ˜…. Jaate jaate bhi tere shampoo ki bottle mere room par padi hogi ğŸ˜‚. First year ke courses. Fir summers main woh cooler se bijli lagna ğŸ˜›. Jab bhi class/lab se aate the, tere kamre main ghus jate the maze lene. Aur teri woh GIF toh save krke rakhi hai, waiting for the right moment to post it ğŸ˜›.
3rd year se toh kamre main ghusne hi nhi deta tha tu ğŸ˜”. Thoda serious sa ho gya. Zabardasti tere room main ghus jaye toh alag baat hai xD. Goa trip toh hamesha yaad rahegi. Tujhe humne swimming krwa hi di finally. Aur pta nhi kitni photos khichwayi tune ğŸ˜›. Aur ab last main toh wing ke "Uncle ji" ne apne jalwe toh dikha hi diye hain. Good luck in this ğŸ˜‰.
Chal bhai milte rehna hamesha. All the best for the future! â¤ï¸ï¸

text: Arey bro, its been a pleasure meeting you. Tere se milke bhut maturity aur hardworing wali feel aati thi. I know you'll do great in life. All the best and touch main rehna ğŸ˜€
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Ayush bhai!
Initially we met through CTFs and SNT Code. Fir ACA project. Aur Su****** Sir ke project se toh pakke dost bann gye. Privacy breaches aur bitching ke saath uss matke ki kya lete the. Aur fir summers main bina sir ko bataye hi sab farraar ğŸ˜‚. ML, compilers, crypto, sab projects main kya hi bulla kaata hai humne. Mast innovative workarounds nikale. Aur teri 'get-it-done' wali mentaility ne usme kafi madad ki. Jab bhi "python is too slow" sunta hu teri "cythonize" krne ki skills yaad aa jati hai ğŸ˜›.
Those bulla sessions made the assignments pretty fun. Main aur Abhyuday dono timepass main lag jate the aur tu akela hi kaam krta rehta tha ğŸ˜…. Ivanka aur Melania Trump main bhi confuse ho gya tha ğŸ˜›. CAA wali delete krne ke badle tune ye video delete karwa di.
Hardwork aur persistence se tu apne goals achieve hi kr leta hai, aur future main bhi krta rehna. I am glad we met and hopefully future main kuch bada krne ka mauka mile. All the best! â¤ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Bibhu bhai!
Kya hi banda hai yr tu. Hamesha chill aur bindass rehta hai. Full time bakchodi ke mood main. Hum noob gamers ke beech main ek pro gamer toh tu hi hai. PUBG se lekar Valorant tak, sab jagah carry kra hai ğŸ˜…. Ping968 ke matches remain one of my top memories in gaming.
Aise bhi mast chill rehta tha tu. Kabhi bhi canteen main mil jata tha. Cricket main toh badhiya hai hi. Aur RAM ko GPU banake FPS double krne ki technique bhi dhundh li tune ğŸ˜›. Cynamo gaming se Dank Rishu ki streams ğŸ˜‚, Esports tournaments dekhke maze krne se khud part lena, kafi mast time spend kra hai apan ne. Aur 4th year main toh Valorant ne maze hi dila diye. Aise hi touch main rehna. Gamers toh milte hi rehte hain waise bhi. Future ke liye All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:
Arey Harshit bhai!
I still remember the time jab main Mudit aur tujhme confuse ho jata tha. Kitni jaldi beet gya woh time. Kitne saare courses kre hain saath main. Finally sab poore ho hi gye. And I never expected ki tu KPop sunta hoga ğŸ˜›. Last main Parallel aur TPMI main raat bhar kaam krna. Aur fir volleyball khelna (bas ball touch krna, khelna toh aata nhi ğŸ˜‚). Aur jo hum fase, bhut neend kharab kri uss incident ne. Aakhirkaar bach hi gye ğŸ˜….
Hamesha se shaant type rha. But mehnat krta rehta. Milte rehna and future ke liye All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
P.S. Naya laptop lele bhai kab tak iss wale ko use krega ğŸ˜›
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Rahul bhai!
Dehri-on-sone ka seth a.k.a Mota. You've been an integral part of my 4 years here. Mast time spend kra hai apan ne. Bulle se lekar Gaming, sab main bakchodi kri hai. FPS games main toh 'suffer' hi kra hai waise ğŸ˜­. First year main chhupke padhai krta tha na tu? Ab toh sach bolde bhai ğŸ˜›, tujhe pehchaan gye hain hum.
Yaad hai Ashu ko current lagne ke baad kaise gaye apan cooler badalne? Uske 10k kabhi wasool nhi paenge ğŸ˜…. Aur woh Odyssey main Quiz di thi, aur 2nd aagye xD. Ping968 ne toh 2nd year main aag laga di thi ğŸ”¥. Games try toh bahut kre but achhe shayad 1-2 main hi ho paye ğŸ˜‚. Saturday subah ka Dosa ko toh hamesha miss krenge ğŸ¥ºï¸. Kitne nightouts maare hain humne iske chakkar main.
Then covid came and contact with others decreased. But thanks to Valorant, we remained in touch throughtout. Enjoy your Odin-god days till you can ğŸ˜›. Aur Fir apni Goa trip jo hamesha yaad rahegi â¤ï¸ï¸.
The night-long random bulla sessions are one my most cherished memories from IITK. Choti si choti cheezon par bhi discussion kr lete hain apan. Your quick wit and humour always added more fun to them.
Chaapne ki toh tumhari aadat hai hi, aise hi aage bhi chaapte rehna. Lucky to have met you. Touch main toh hamesha rahenge. All the best for future! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Raju bhai!
Pehle toh "Bahut accha aadmi hai yr tu" likhke khatam krne wala tha, but socha thoda lamba likh du ğŸ˜›. One of the most fun and chill guys to be around. Humour aur hype se discussions ka mood high kr deta hai (WOOHOOO!). Pubg se fortnite se Apex se RoE se TF2 se Valorant. Bahut maze kre hain. Wing ka sabse bada streamer (Kilojoule Gaming ftw), aur paw control champion. Woh Pubg tournament yaad hai? Background main OBS ğŸ˜‚. Covid aane ke baad bhi contact main rahe. One of the closest friends I've made. Teri photoshopping skills ke toh kya hi kehne ğŸ˜‚. Aur placements main toh chaapke aaya hi hai.
Ab crypto start kr rhe hain, isme bhi chaapna hai (though starting to kaafi kharaab hui hai ğŸ˜…). Lucky to have met you. Chal aage milte rehna. Aur gamers toh roz hi milte hain ğŸ˜. Future ke liye All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey bhai! Had a great time with you. First year ke maze toh hamesha yaad rahenge. PUBG se lekar Valorant tak, bhut bakchodiyan kari hain. Aur raat main Resident evil main kya hi fat-ti thi teri ğŸ˜‚. Random bulla sessions ke toh alag hi maze the yr, woh toh sabse zyada yaad aaenge. Aur tere papa se kitni baar mujhe call aayi hain mujhe hi pata hai ğŸ˜‚, aise hi taal deta tha unhe.
Waise you are of the most surprising people I've met. Jis cheez ke peeche pad gya waha chaap dega, warna aise hi chodd dega. Kayi baar surprise kra hai tune aise, starting se ab tak. Iss khoobi ko banaye rakhna, tere se unexpected cheezain expect krte rahenge. Aur aage toh milte hi rahenge â¤ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text: Yo bro! Lucky to have found a friend like you. First year main Borderlands-2 khelne ke alag hi maze the, kabhi nhi bhulenge ğŸ˜. Bhut dedicated banda hai yr tu, aur hamesha high aim krta hai, aur kuch naya krne ki koshish krta hai. Iss cheez ko hamesha banaye rakhna ğŸ˜. Aur koi trip plan kare toh zaroor batana, I feel bad for not going to Manali ğŸ˜•. Stay in touch and good luck with the future âœŒï¸.
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Utkarsh bhai!
Humare papa apas main humse pehle mil liye the ğŸ˜…. But uske baad se one of the closest friends I've had. First two years to hum dono har doosre month train se ghar aa jate the xD (aur tu ghar se bag bharke snacks le aata tha ğŸ˜›). Aur woh 5 ghante ki journey aise hi discussions aur pichle 2 months ki bitching main nikal jata tha ğŸ˜‚. Diwali ke time North-East express ki bhasad yaad hai? ğŸ˜‚
Apni cheezain mast match hui waise. Aur Bangalore main toh bahut hi badhiya time nikla apna. Fir corona happened and the train journeys stopped, but the rants didn't ğŸ˜…. Finally Parallel main jo hum fase, aur sabki fati. Pehle maine tujhe sambhala, fir tune mujhe ğŸ˜….
Chalo ek saal aur enjoy karo college. Jaise in 4 saal main regularly mile hain, waise hi milte rehna. All the best for future! â¤ï¸ï¸
